    • Method Detail

      • findById

        public FileRecord findById(java.lang.String id,
                  int fileType,
                  @Context
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)

        Searches for a single FileRecord object given a URL encoded ID string.

        Parameters:
        id - The URL encoded path to look for.
        fileType - An integer indicating what file type is being used.
        req - Servlet request object containing client request parameters.
        Returns:
        The requested FileRecord as an object. Serialized by Jackson into JSON.

      • create

        public ResultMessage create(FileRecord fileRecord,
                   @Context
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)

        Creates a new file from a FileRecord object.

        Parameters:
        fileRecord - The FileRecord object to add.
        req - Servlet request object containing client request parameters.
        Returns:
        A ResultMessage object containing the results of the add request. Serialized by Jackson into JSON.

      • copy

        public ResultMessage copy(java.lang.String ids,
                 int fileType,
                 @Context
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)

        Copies a list of files.

        Parameters:
        ids - A comma separated list of file paths to copy.
        fileType - An integer indicating what file type is being used.
        req - Servlet request object containing client request parameters.
        Returns:
        A ResultMessage object containing the results of the copy request. Serialized by Jackson into JSON.

      • edit

        public ResultMessage edit(FileRecord fileRecord,
                 @Context
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)

        Renames a file based on a FileRecord object.

        Parameters:
        fileRecord - The FileRecord object to add.
        req - Servlet request object containing client request parameters.
        Returns:
        A ResultMessage object containing the results of the add request. Serialized by Jackson into JSON.

      • remove

        public ResultMessage remove(java.lang.String ids,
                   int fileType,
                   @Context
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)

        Deletes a list of files.

        Parameters:
        ids - A comma separated list of file paths to delete.
        fileType - An integer indicating what file type is being used.
        req - Servlet request object containing client request parameters.
        Returns:
        A ResultMessage object containing the results of the delete request. Serialized by Jackson into JSON.
